title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved without the correct file type extension and the icon changes from the original parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The icon should remain as the parent java file icon.
SR: When using the SaveAs function, ensure that the file is saved with the correct file type extension and that the icon remains unchanged from the original file.
